relation: Hang out with friends and attend school events.
Stay on top of your studies and if you have the chance to get ahead, do it.
Marian University is a great community based, private college. I have developed great personal and professional relationships here. It is one of the best colleges in the U.S.

textAfterTable: This college has many different possible majors and minors. It has classes based on liberal arts and those for specialized for majors. I am learning a LOT here. Not only through just the liberal arts courses but also the Nursing courses I am currently taking. It has helped me understand more about life, people, and much more. Login to rate or flag the reviews Allison from Pleasant Prairie, WI 07/28/2011 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 32 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Any student that learns best in small classes. If you're looking to go for internships this is definitely the place to go because your teachers will get to know you and like you and will be willing to help you find jobs and/or internships. If you like getting involved in community service, or just doing a lot of extras with your friends Marian has a TON of things to do outside of the classroom.
